svg:

Things to implement:clerk1. Migrate to Planetscale (drizzle/kysely/prisma)2. `app` router RSC3. Add "workflows"4. Setup automatic emails when video processing is done5. Allow TTS audios only when the user is sure of thetext content6. Keep things modular, for example:User should be able to add table only when necessary7. Automatic Retries and proper error handling8. Weekly/Monthly free credits9. Image picker (Avoiding all copyright issues) Unsplash, Google, Bing, etc.10. ShadCN UI, Taxonomy11. Zod validation everywhere12. Yaml instead of JSON?13. Using Chat for changing contents of each individual video section14. The UI should be like Powerpoint, with slides section on the left. Each slide represents a "scene" in the video, kind of like Windows Movie Maker.15. Different TTS engines? (Bark, MS TTS, Google, ElevenLabs, Murf.AI)16. Using Open Source everything! (with URL/upload functionality) - StableDiffusion/OpenJourney for images - SadTalker for Talking heads - Bark AI for TTS1. Enter brief what the video is about.AI will generate 10 "titles" which you can edit.Then you can click on "Proceed".2. A new UI appears that looks like "Powerpoint"3. You will be able to go to each "slide" which is a section of a video (like Windows movie maker)4. There you can generate any text, images, talkingPoint, and TTS audio5. This editor will be free to play around, even without signin.Only normal editing will be available without login.AI generation and stuff that costs money will require signin.Changes will only persist if you're signed in.6. For each video section, you will be able to set: - In and out Transition - Block type - table, chart, "slide", "slide with image", "images" - talkingPoint - Images - uploaded by user, or generated by AI - Table1. Enter brief what the video is about.AI will generate 2 characters which you can change. Select a an appropriate sprite and voice for each character.Then you can click on "Proceed".2. A new UI appears that looks like "Descript" or the "captions section from https://veed.io"3. The video will largely look like a zoom call between N number of people.They can share screen (via recording), show images, etc.You will be able to edit each "dialogue" which as a section of the podcast.4. There you can generate any text, images, talkingPoint, and TTS audio5. This editor will be free to play around, even without signin.Only normal editing will be available without login.AI generation and stuff that costs money will require signin.Changes will only persist if you're signed in.6. For each video section, you will be able to set: - In and out Transition - Block type - table, chart, "slide", "slide with image", "images" - talkingPoint - Images - uploaded by user, or generated by AI - TableWorkflow 1: "Slides"Workflow 2: "Podcast"
